title.zh: 线上：《正确认识血友病携带者》科普文章发布
title.en: Online: Publication of 'Understanding Hemophilia Carriers' Educational Article

subtitle.zh: 关爱我们的母亲、姐妹、女儿
subtitle.en: Caring for Our Mothers, Sisters, and Daughters

description.zh: 在南昌血友协会微信公众号，左钰洁发布了一篇科普文章《正确认识血友病携带者 关爱我们的母亲、姐妹、女儿》。这篇文章系统性地介绍了血友病携带者和患者的相关知识，为提高公众对女性血友病群体的认知和关注做出了重要贡献。
description.en: On the WeChat public account of Nanchang Hemophilia Association, Yujie (Ruby) Zuo published an important educational article titled 'Understanding Hemophilia Carriers - Caring for Our Mothers, Sisters, and Daughters'. This article systematically introduces knowledge about hemophilia carriers, making an important contribution to raising public awareness and attention to women with hemophilia.

title.zh: 微信公众号：科普文章全文
